text: Tim Lopes (born Arcanjo Antonino Lopes do Nascimento; November 18, 1950 â€“ June 2, 2002) was a Brazilian investigative journalist and producer for the Brazilian television network Rede Globo. == Abduction and assassination == In 2002, he was reported missing while working undercover on a story in one of Rio's favelas. It was later learned that Lopes was kidnapped by drug leaders. He was tortured by having his hands, arms, and legs severed with a sword while still alive. He was later burned alive on June 2, 2002. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2002 deaths Category:Brazilian journalists Category:Brazilian murder victims Category:People from Rio Grande do Sul
